title: Huawei Watch_How can I view the version number of the Android Wear app and update to the latest version?
answer:
**To view the app version number: **Launch the Android Wear app, touch ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/73452_wcmu1.png "click to enlarge") in the upper right corner, and select **About**.

**To update to the latest version:** The Android Wear app will automatically check for version updates and send you an update notification on the app's home screen. You can also update through update notifications sent by Google Play<sup id="EN-US_TOPIC_0019757464__sup34815350174537">TM</sup>.
keywords: view, version number, Android Wear, app, update, upgrade
